thread.section_title: Easy Signs Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Easy Signs | easysigns.com.au
thread.title: Lauren T
thread.title_full: Easy Signs reviewed by Lauren T

author: Lauren T
title: Lauren T
text:
This is my second time I have ordered with Easy Signs. I am very impressed with their efficient service once again.
Within less than an hour of placing my order I received an email from one of the team thanking me for my order and advising me the artwork team will email me shortly with which to about the hour on the dot of placing my order I had the artwork proof. In two working days my pull up banners arrived. They look great!
Thanks to all the Team at Easy Signs for the excellent service and making ordering so easy!
